name: Lean
description:
[00](http://project00.net) designed the Lean range through a series of fit out commissions in London. It has a stripped back, warehouse aesthetic, with the designs simplified to the bare essentials.

Desk, the first OpenDesk, was designed with and for leading product development agency [Mint Digital](/case_studies/mint-digital). The Meeting and Cafe tables were developed through the major fit out of the [Hub Westminster](/case_studies/hub-westminster), a 12,000 sqft shared workspace in central London.
